reviews.review:
这游戏技术很重要 还有队友的配合 
现在的官匹 全是神仙 一点都不友好 完全没有了公平竞技的体验 
希望官方加大力度
tudo foda so q as skins deviam ser mais baratas
Игра очень хорошая, играю в неё уже год и пока что все нравится, да не приятно конечно, что ее сделали бесплатной, но все же она моя самая любимая игра
Very fun game to play with friends, requires decent reaction time and hand eye coordination.

Saudades de quando o VAC funcionava... R.I.P CS-GO

vc passa um pouco de raiva mas com o tempo fica mt bom lakakaka
Игра в которой вы можете посраться даже с добрым человеком

need more practice on csgo, a lotta friends said 800 hrs is the shortest for a relatively good player, but im hooked to it, so i guess csgo might be the game that ill play for the longest especially with its various tactics and strategies, nades use. love it.

CSGO is the best computer game, and fps out there.  Incredible talent and 20 years of development has produced a fantastic product.   The one and only complaint is the fact that hackers can get into the game and cheat all day, everyday.  Make VAC secure mean something again.  Thanks.
i like it but the anti cheat could be hella better
bon jeu même si la commu laisse à désirer de temps en temps.
Anti Cheat system kann überarbeitet werden, sonst top spiel.
Good game. if new watch war owl he will get you started.
its a game that doesnt suck

you need to be tactical its fun

Valve Anti Cheat 'VAC' is a mindblowingly complicated way to stop cheaters. It is very effective, and it

is impossible to cheat on VAC enabled servers. If VAC detects a cheater, it'll VAC ban them instantly, and there is

no other way to play CS, because matchmaking is the only way to play competitive CS:GO. VAC is one of the best

anti-cheats made to date, it catches 100% of cheaters, keeping CS:GO Matchmaking very clean."
想不到什么理由说它好玩  干就完事了
Was the best competitive game of its time.
